_meanings:
{@--3@} To fetch,
bring; {#vahati jalamiyaM#} <ls>Mu. 1. 4.</ls>

{@--10@} To suffer, feel, experience;  
<ls>Bv. 1. 94</ls>; so {#duHKaM, harzaM, SokaM, tozaM#} &c.
{@--14@} To breathe.

{@--1@} To cause to bear or
carry, cause to be brought or led.
{@--2@} To drive, impel, direct.

{@--4@} To use, carry;
<ls>Bk. 14. 23.</ls>
{@--5@} To place in a boat.
{@--6@} To proceed, go.

{@--7@} To carry out,
complete, finish.
{@--8@} To go to, visit.

To wish to
carry &c.
